content: **instead of buying the pattern donate the amount you would be willing to spend on a pattern to a charity of your choice ** you can also get this on my payhip store 1 and learn about the creation of them here 2 i live in the twin cities in minnesota and since the beginning of 2026 there has a been a large ice presence the escalation of their tactics and not respecting human or constitutional rights does not sit well with me please put your rage and emotions into your mittens and use them for some good trouble there are extra charts and make your own charts included **yarn ** these mittens are made with worsted because i like thick mittens but they can easily be used with dk or fingering held together i used malabrigo rios but arroyo or cascade 220 superwash would work just as well especially if you are a tight knitter if you are making small kid mittens sport or fingering will make them smaller but you will need to find that gauge this is best for intermediate-level knitters or at least done some fair isle before **size ** one size - the mitten is approximately 9 inches long 7 5-8 inches around but may differ depending on your gauge to make them bigger or smaller **yarn amount needed ** ﻿mc of worsted or dk yarn 53g/102m 112yd cc of worsted or dk yarn 35-40g/70-80m 77-87yd **tips ** * i do not recommend highly speckled yarn because it makes the pattern difficult to see * i used 8 circulars which i knit looser on than dpns so if using dpns you might go up a needle size be sure to match the guage * if you want a u instead of a star in the palm there is a chart for it 1 https //payhip com/b/v10vk 2 https //payhip com/cosgriffcreations/blog/cosgriff-creations-in-process/human-rights-protest-mittens
